rows.label: tlk45400251_01_msg0001
rows.name:
That's an adorable Blade you're
traveling with, my dear!

rows.label: tlk45400251_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Though knowing Drivers and Blades, I
suppose even the cutest of you still
get up to some pretty barbaric stuff.

rows.label: tlk45400251_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Like knocking enemies to
the ground and then launching
them into the air...

rows.label: tlk45400251_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Or even smashing them back down into
the ground for massive damage! I've
heard those Invidian brutes do that.

rows.label: tlk45400251_01_msg0005
rows.name:
I can't stand that kind of thing. Battle
should be handled with precision and
grace. Like Special Inquisitor Meleph!

rows.label: tlk45400251_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh, what I wouldn't give to be able
to have tea with her sometime...
